parameters: Is this the scene of the incident?
The place's been kept as it is back then...
There's a lot of succubi around.
The succubi here are all friends,
It doesn't seem fine to me...
I was told that the culprit has been sighted...
How about we try to resolve this, then?
\C[17]Murder on Succubus St.\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
All the facilities around here are the
All stores except Oppoteide are illegal.
It's better to stay away from them.
Didn't you hear about it already?
I just thought you might've just
been saying it to keep your business image...
Let me give you an overview of the incident.
A little while ago, two succubi were slain here with
a knife. The culprit has been spotted──
That is to say, there are eyewitness reports.
If you've gotten that far, just go
However, not only has the culprit not been caught,
progress hadn't been made on the case whatsoever.
By the way, what does the culprit
Apparently a Murder Maiden is behind it.
Not that that's surprising or anything.
You mean, the Murder Maiden who passed
That one would be the culprit?
Why are you looking at me like that?
I think we found the culprit.
If I were the culprit, I'd have just said
that I killed those two, no?
Why'd I waste my time with it?
If I killed her already and said
I didn't kill her, praise the stars,
it'd be so unbearable I'd faint.
but she holds killing to be most supreme.
Therefore, there'd be no reason for
her to lie. Rather, she'd have said it
But still, that is how Murder Maidens are.
I'll help you eliminate the real culprit,
I agree with you on the part that
we need to take action by ourselves.
If this continues, we'll be in big trouble.
But still, what do we do?
It should have information about the incident.
...For some reason, a Succubus is standing
in front of the entrance. That girl, if I recall...
Would she let us through if we ask?
We have a Murder Maiden with us.
But wouldn't bringing her in mean
I want to kill you so bad...♥
Seriously, what's wrong with you all?
\C[17]Murder on Succubus St.\C[0]'s details have been updated.
I was told that the culprit was spotted, but then...
Oh my, what a cute boy♥
Wanna do something good with me?
Put it in and go plap plap spurt for me♥
I'm sure entering won't be a problem,
but what if the ones inside finds out?
It's impossible to not be found anyway.
If the functions have no issues, we'd
be discovered the moment we enter.
This building isn't exactly legal, either,
so there's no problem if we get rough.
Don't kill them, you'd end up another culprit.
Limit yourself to simply pacifying them.
I know \N[14] has been weird for a while now,
but even Ino's not right on his head these days.
It's so out of the ordinary that it's...
hard to comprehend by ordinary people.
Well, let's leave this at that.
\C[17]Murder on Succubus St.\C[0]'s details have been updated.
I can enter the 7th Administration Building
There's a door, but it won't open...
If you have no business, please go hoooome.
The inside is a big mess right now, so
it's better you don't go iiiiin.
My store is small... but I can guarantee you
that I can offer a better experience than Oppoteide.
Then I have to go, don't I!?
So there's someone like you in Oppoteide...
As I thought, corporations are built different...
I work around these parts... slimy is best.

events.name: 会話イベント（魔物参加）
